descriptions.briefDescription: Bastion server based on Ubuntu OS
descriptions.fullDescription:
The Ubuntu-based bastion server deployed in a domain has VPN access to all the monitored devices. It is accessible through SSH.
Some packages have been pre-installed: git, ansible, tmux, mc, vim, emacs-nox, python2 and python3.
